long_description: Perfect for sipping your morning coffee by the campfire, the GSI Outdoors Infinity Backpacker Mug is lightweight, easy to hold and holds a generous 17 oz. so you can share-or not. Durable, lightweight polypropylene material is 100% recyclable and BPA-free; insulating sleeve protects your hand and helps beverage keep its warmth. Sealable sip-it lid prevents spills while allowing easy drinking. GSI Outdoors Infinity Backpacker Mug weighs a mere 3.5 oz.
short_description: Perfect for sipping your morning coffee by the campfire, the GSI Outdoors Infinity Backpacker Mug is lightweight, easy to hold and holds a generous 17 oz. so you can share-or not.
